name: Foni
description:
This was supposed to be an attempt to see how competent a Furi boss I could make without doing any 3d modelling, but I utterly ran out of time to apply any polish. Still, thought the animations were surprisingly okay for cubes.

Controls  (gamepad recommended)

  • Dash (can be charged) - X on Dualshock, A on Xbox, Space on keyboard
  • Attack - Square on Dualshock, X on Xbox, LShift on keyboard
  • Block (successful blocks heal) - Circle on Dualshock, B on Xbox, F on keyboard
  • Shoot - Right stick on controllers, not implemented on keyboard... (gamepad REALLY recommended)

Made for #1GAM January 2018, the theme was Rebirth.
